00107 template <typename PropertyImpl>
00108 bool CPropertiesManager::RegisterPropertyType()
00109 {
00110        return GetPropertyFactory().RegisterFactory(new istd::TSingleFactory<iser::IObject, PropertyImpl>(PropertyImpl::GetTypeName()), true);
00111 }
